scripts.test: HAIBUN_KEY=__test HAIBUN_LOG_LEVEL=log HAIBUN_O_A11YSTEPPER_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_OUTREVIEWS_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_TRACE=true HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_CAPTURE_VIDEO=true haibun-cli e2e --config e2e/local
scripts.local-client: HAIBUN_KEY=_client HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_HAIBUNLOADTESTSSTEPPER_TOKEN=local92 HAIBUN_O_HAIBUNLOADTESTSSTEPPER_TRACKS_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_CAPTURE_VIDEO=true HAIBUN_TRACE=true HAIBUN_O_OUTREVIEWS_STORAGE=StorageFS haibun-cli load-tests/client
scripts.container-client: HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_HEADLESS=true HAIBUN_KEY=_client HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_HAIBUNLOADTESTSSTEPPER_TOKEN=local92 HAIBUN_O_HAIBUNLOADTESTSSTEPPER_TRACKS_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_CAPTURE_VIDEO=true HAIBUN_TRACE=true HAIBUN_O_OUTREVIEWS_STORAGE=StorageFS haibun-cli load-tests/client
